remarks: An open interval shifted by a real number.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
iooshift.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
iooshift.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
iooshift.3 $e |- ( ph -> T e. RR ) $.
iooshift $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + T ) (,) ( B + T ) ) = { w e. CC | E. z e. ( A (,) B ) w = ( z + T ) } ) $.
$d A w z $.
$d B w z $.
$d T w z $.
$d ph z $.
